content.question: Mr. Pontellier’s behavior when he returns home reveals that his character is

choices.label: easygoing, because he immediately enters into the family’s routine
softhearted, because he is overwhelmed by concern for the children
self-centered, because he disrupts the sleep of his wife and children
insecure, because he wants his wife to be impressed by his social life

content.answer: self-centered, because he disrupts the sleep of his wife and children

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
